comments:
M7 + new sync view code
I've seen the viewer object contributions in sync view pages not show. If you 
close/re-open the view they appear again. I'm not sure how this happens, but 
what is worse is that often they will appear for a while an then disapear. 

The viewer contributions are being added by sync pages and all we are doing is 
registering the context menu with a particular id (e.g. the targetID in the 
viewer contribution) with the workbench.

I suspect a workbench problem, but would like to get a reproduceable case.
*** Bug 53545 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 53588 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 53593 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Increasing priority. The current workaround is to close the sync view and
re-open. Ensure that the sync view is closed in all perspectives in the same
window. I'm not sure what may of changed in the workbench to cause this, we are
simply using viewer contributions, nothing special.

The workaround doesn't work for me. Closing and reopening the sync view doesn't 
change the behavior.

Fix released to HEAD. I've will mail a patch to people on the cc'list. I've
tried in vain to attach a patch this this bug, bugzilla is returning a software
error.
verified the fix on linux-gtk - everything works as expected.

Reopening. The problem is back on one of my machines again (not the original 
one), with I20040303.
I suspect it has to do with me previewing changes after a sync. Once I did 
that, and updated my workspace in this way, actions were gone in the sync view.

Unclear whether this is related, but while performing updates through the 
preview dialog, I got the following errors:

Also checked that closing all sync views/perspectives doesn't help either.
BTW I am running multiple windows.

Must be related to multiple window scenario. I checked on my other machine, and 
the problem exists there as well, but only in one of my 2 windows. One sync 
view has all menu entries, one has the minimum.

Created an attachment (id=8326)
Offending menu without sync actions

Only one of my windows is lacking these menu actions.

Exiting/restarting doesn't seem to help either. I will zip my workspace up, and 
post it (URL to be sent to Jean-Michel). It is quite big as it is a self-
hosting workspace.

Actually, did your fix make it in the build ? I guess no, since the rebuild 
never occurred. I applied again the patch you gave me, and the problem was 
gone.
*** Bug 53720 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
So I guess you can close it definitely now.
Fix is in todays I build.
